item.title: Mounting CSEK protected disk with LUKS encryption on Google Compute Engine
item.description: Simple procedure that attaches a GCE persistent disk to a VM where the disk itself is encrypted by a key you define (Customer Supplied Encryption Key). In addition, the startup script also does a final round of encryption on top of that on the mounted disk using LUKS.
